results.content: {"results": [{"title": "Top Companies in Identity and Access Management (IAM) Market - 2025 Analysis", "content": "The global IAM market is projected to grow from $25.96 billion in 2025 to $42.61 billion by 2030 at a CAGR of 10.4%. Key drivers include zero-trust architecture adoption and AI-powered access controls. Major players include Microsoft, Okta, IBM, Oracle, SailPoint, CyberArk, and Ping Identity. Microsoft's Entra ID leads with M365 integration, while Okta excels in multi-cloud environments with 7,000+ pre-built integrations.", "url": "https://www.marketsandmarkets.com/ResearchInsight/identity-access-management-iam-market.asp"}, {"title": "Okta vs Microsoft Entra ID: Access Management Comparison 2025", "content": "Okta offers superior SSO across different platforms and apps with strong MFA control and adaptive authentication. Best for non-Microsoft environments. Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD) excels in Microsoft 365 ecosystems with bundled pricing and easier rollout. O
